code: import React from'react';import{useTheme,THEME_LIST}from'../../../hooks/useTheme';import'../../../index.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemeSection=()=>{const[theme,changeTheme]=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-finder-text-secondary text-[11px] font-medium uppercase px-2 mb-1",children:"Theme"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"space-y-px",children:THEME_LIST.map(_ref=>{let{id,name,color,className}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>changeTheme(color),className:`flex items-center w-full px-2 py-1 rounded-md ${theme===color?'bg-finder-accent bg-opacity-20':'hover:bg-finder-hover'}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"window-controls",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`window-control ${color==='red'?'close':color==='orange'?'minimize':'maximize'}`,style:{backgroundColor:color==='red'?'#FF5F57':color==='orange'?'#FEBC2E':color==='yellow'?'#FFE08C':color==='green'?'#28C840':color==='blue'?'#0A84FF':color==='purple'?'#BF5AF2':'#98989D'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-finder-text",children:name})]},id);})})]});};export default ThemeSection;
